official_title: A bill to confirm a conveyance of certain real property by the Central Pacific Railway Company and Southern Pacific Company to A. C. Taber and his wife, Mary Taber.

summary.text: Confirms the conveyance of certain described real property by the Central Pacific Railway Company and Southern Pacific Company to certain named individuals with respect to interest of the United States in the rights to such real property.

titles.title: A bill to confirm a conveyance of certain real property by the Central Pacific Railway Company and Southern Pacific Company to A. C. Taber and his wife, Mary Taber.
